infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SounndScout requires access to your camera to let you take a profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SoundScout needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images and videos for your profile and show advertisements
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: SoundScout needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload images and videos for your profile and show advertisements
